text: Dick Wilson, born Riccardo Di Guglielmo (30 July 1916 - 19 November 2007), was a British-Canadian character actor. He was known for playing grocery store manager Mr. (George) Whipple in over 500 Charmin toilet paper television commercials (1965â€“1989, 1999-2000). Wilson was raised in Hamilton, Ontario. He died in Woodland Hills, Los Angeles, California, aged 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * * An interview with Dick Wilson *Obituary in the Inland Valley Daily Bulletin Category:1916 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Actors from Lancashire Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors
title: Dick Wilson
